results.text: The island hides a spring that restores life to anyone washed in it, as per the raise dead spell. A creature can only benefit from the spring once.
A djinni recluse dwells on the island and grants favors.
Pixies beg the characters to help them oust a group of [[3d10]] trophy hunters (scouts) from the island.
The island holds the tomb of an archdruid, which contains a portal to the Feywild.
